  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92007</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92007</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Friction force with liquids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion Kraft mit Flüssigkeiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Force de frottement avec des liquides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Força da fricção com líquidos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forza di attrito con i liquidi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύναμη τριβής με τα υγρά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerza de la fricción con los líquidos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the fish's streamlined shape allows it to move in the water easily. Objects  with this shape experiences less friction force when moving in a liquid medium.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">friction force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Liquid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">streamlined shape</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die geglättete Form 
des Fisches sie in das Wasser leicht bewegen läßt. Nachrichten
mit dieser Form erfährt weniger Friktion Kraft beim Bewegen in einen 
flüssigen Medium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la forme 
améliorée du poisson lui permet de se déplacer dans l'eau 
facilement. Les objets avec cette forme éprouve moins de force 
de frottement en se déplaçant un support liquide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a forma 
aerodinamizada do peixe permite que se mova na água fàcilmente. 
Os objetos com esta forma experimentam menos força da fricção
ao mover-se em um media líquido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la figura 
migliorata del pesce permette che si muova facilmente nell'acqua. 
Gli oggetti con questa figura avverte meno forza di attrito 
quando si muove in un media liquido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η βελτιωμένη μορφή των
ψαριών επιτρέπει σε την για να κινηθεί στο ύδωρ εύκολα. Την
τα αντικείμενα με αυτήν την μορφή δοκιμάζουν τη λιγότερη δύναμη 
τριβής κατά κίνηση σε ένα υγρό μέσο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la dimensión de una
variable aerodinamizada del pescado permite que se mueva en el agua 
fácilmente. Los objetos con esta dimensión de una variable 
experimentan menos fuerza de la fricción al moverse en un media 
líquido.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fische</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flüssigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">streamlined Form</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poissons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force de frottement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Liquide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">forme profilée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">peixes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força da fricção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Líquido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">forma aerodinâmica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pesci</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza di attrito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Liquido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">figura streamlined</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ψάρια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δύναμη τριβής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βελτιωμένη μορφή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pescados</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza de la fricción</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
